title: World Theater Day
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>Mari-san, today is “World Theater Day”!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Wow, we have a day for that? Then, today is a really important anniversary for you, right Shizuku♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Yes♪ Actually, I have something to ask you, Mari-san….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>What is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>What kind of place is Broadway? It’s somewhere that I’ve dreamed of visiting, and a stage I've dreamed of standing on!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Broadway…. Hmm, it’s a place full of large and small theaters, there are a lot of musicals and plays held throughout the year…. But well, you already know this right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Yes! I’ve heard that you can see different plays everyday, it’s truly a dream-like place!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Then, do you know about the “Stage Door”?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>“Stage Door”....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>It’s the name for doors that the performers come out from after a play to interact with their fans. You can get signs and selfies outside of the theater!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Eh!? S-, something like that exists!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Yes! So Shizuku, make sure to study English hard, so one day you can convey your feelings to your favorite performer at the stage door!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I will….! My motivation to learn English has just increased! Then Mari-san, please teach me English!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Of course! I’ll be harsh though~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
